title: Firefox for Android 53.0a2 Aurora

notes.note:
[Right to Left][1] Language Support - Arabic (ar), Urdu (ur), Hebrew (he) and Persian (fa)


  [1]: https://wiki.mozilla.org/Mobile/Firefox_for_Android/RTL
EME (Encrypted Media Extensions) DRM video enabled on Firefox for Android
Move Android audio/video decoder out of application process for better stability during media playback

system_requirements:
## Operating systems
 - Android 4.0
 - Above versions

## Requirements
 - 50 MB internal storage
 - 384 MB of RAM
 - display at least 320 pixels high and 240 pixels wide
